biotools.summary: A python package with modules to measure anharmonicity in the form of higher-order statistics and its variation as a function of time, output a storyboard representation of the simulations to identify key anharmonic conformational events, and identify putative anharmonic conformational substates and visualization of transitions between these substates.

bioschemas.name: ANCA
bioschemas.summary: A python package with modules to measure anharmonicity in the form of higher-order statistics and its variation as a function of time, output a storyboard representation of the simulations to identify key anharmonic conformational events, and identify putative anharmonic conformational substates and visualization of transitions between these substates.
